txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Needed: Broken wood spears from the Orcs plaguing Meluinen. Deliver the items to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath.
'It is good to see that you are willing to stand against the Orcs. We are grateful for your assistance.'
'The Orcs infesting the area of Meluinen must be driven back... can you prove to us that you are assisting in these efforts?'
Elves of Rivendell Task: Broken Wood Spears
Thaliollang in the Elf-ruin of Meluinen at Lin Giliath requires the return of broken wood spears.
Deliver the broken wood spears to Thaliollang at Lin Giliath
You are on a task to collect broken wood spears from Orcs plaguing Meluinen and to deliver them to Thaliollang. Thaliollang can be found at Lin Giliath, the Elf-ruins of Meluinen.
Needed: Broken wood spears from the Orcs plaguing Meluinen.
